channel.title: Loss Functions on DSG | IIT Roorkee
channel.description: Recent content in Loss Functions on DSG | IIT Roorkee

item.title: Visualizing Loss Functions
item.description: Visualising different loss and optimisation functions using Autoencoder. The aim of the project was to reconstruct images with the help of Autoencoders to visualise the difference in output when different loss or optimisation functions are used.
